name: Small Commercial
description: Small Commercial Projects(SCP) are projects that are typically user defined, require some modifications and that could be a combimation of engineered and/or over the counter products. Siemens' solutions in this space could be, but not limited to, panel boards, safety switches, modular metering and transformers. SCP is typically featured in commercial grading applications along with K-12, High-Rise and Mixed use.

name: Large Construction
description: Large Construction Projects are projects that require engineered solutions to meet the customer's unique specifications. These projects allow for creative solutions to meet the application's needs and requirements. Complex construction applications typically contain but not limited to low voltage switchgear, busway, switchboards, power monitoring and power panels.

name: Industrial
description: Factories, Plants, etc. an Industrial project means the land, buildings, equipment, facilities, and improvements required for use by manufacturing or industrial enterprise.
